lines.content: * Bobby is a chatbot that can manage a list of tasks, ToDos, Deadlines, and Events.
* It can mark tasks as done, unmark, delete and add tasks.
* Greeting message displayed when the bot starts
private static final String GREETING = "Hello! I'm Bobby\n"
* Exit msg when the bot terminates
